transcript: Yes, I know you did you threw him out of the window into the grand canal. I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Yes, I know you did.  You threw him out of the window into the Grand Canal.  I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.
